  • Method Details

    • convertToDto

      public MediumDto convertToDto​(Medium medium)
      Converts a given Medium to a MediumDTO. It also adds various needed information such the average rating of the medium
      Parameters:
      medium - the Medium that should be converted
      Returns:
      the converted MediumDTO

    • getGenresSet

      public java.util.Set<Genre> getGenresSet​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> genreStrings)
      Returns references to the given genres. Creates genres that do not exist
      Parameters:
      genreStrings - the list of genre names that should be searched within the database
      Returns:
      the list of genre entities

    • getLanguageSet

      public java.util.Set<Language> getLanguageSet​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> languageStrings)
      Returns references to the given languages. Creates languages that do not exist
      Parameters:
      languageStrings - the list of language names that should be searched within the database
      Returns:
      the list of language entities
